solution_line_template: If it takes on average {old_average} minutes to get dressed, then it takes {total_needed} minutes total on the school week because {days_in_week} x {old_average} = <<{total_needed}={total_needed}>>{total_needed}
Thus far this week it has taken him {total_so_far} minutes to get dressed because {monday} + {tuesday} + {wednesday} + {thursday} = <<{total_so_far}={total_so_far}>>{total_so_far}
To tie his previous method, he needs to take {friday_needed} minutes on Friday because {total_needed} - {total_so_far} = <<{total_needed}-{total_so_far}={friday_needed}>>{friday_needed}
